section.title: class codes creating new Class Code
section.para: To create a new Class Code, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: Create your Class Codes using a logical, hierarchical structure. This will make it easier to retrieve Class Code information in the future.

section.para: When creating a new Class Code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique code to identify the Class Code.
Enter a description to further identify the Class Code.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Class Code, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Class Code and adds it to the master list of Class Codes.
